BrightBlade, Rage

* BrightBlade continued to fire upon Tavatron, suddenly her systems alerted 
her that somebot was loosing power quickly. She looked around and saw Gangon 
trying to dig a hole under the Maximal base and then looked back at 
Tavatron, Gangon was her partner...she just couldn't abandon him!
BrightBlade suddenly shot 4 charges in a row at Tavatron and then hopped 
down from the boulder, she kept firing at the boulder as she backed up 
towards Gangon. Finally she bumped into her partner and snarled down to 
him...*

" There's an extra energy charge in my back compartment, I was saving it for 
an emergency...this seems like a good enough one to me. Take it. It isn't 
much but it'll get you through the battle."

* She continued to fire upon the boulder as she opened her compartment so 
that Gangon could get to the energy reserve, she knew that he was her 
partner and her only real friend. It would be a shame and a waste if he was 
to die now.*

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

* Rage snarled in fright as she backed away from Scourge, this was so 
strange and scary! How could that attack do this to her, turn her into one 
of them?
She was shaking a little from the shock of it all, how could this have 
happened? And what scared her even more was that she was beginning to 
understand the sounds that came from her attacker, beginning to understand 
his language!
Rage snarled again, what was she going to do?
She slowly got to her feet and stood in front of the Predacon, she was a bit 
unsteady but she was able to keep her balance.
A question formed in her mind as she looked at Scourge with her grey optics, 
even sooner the question formed on her lips...*

" Who...who... you?"

* Her voice was soft at that moment, no louder then a whisp of wind and 
twice as smooth. It wasn't the loud roar that she was used to but it was all 
she could make right now, and even though she could speak she still had much 
to learn about putting together a proper sentence.
Rage looked at Scourge from head to foot, he was rather a big male and 
almost seemed to have a dominating environment around him.
She almost seemed intimidated by him, but she wasn't about to show any signs 
of submission yet.*
